info.name: Celebrity Persona API
info.description: Complete API collection for Celebrity Persona — Auth (User/Admin/SuperAdmin), Content Management (Celebrities, Outfits, News, Movies, Reviews), and SuperAdmin Management (Users, Admins, Celebrities, Outfits, Stats).

request.description: Create the SuperAdmin account. Only one can exist. Requires the special key.

exec: if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.data) { pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', r.data.accessToken); pm.collectionVariables.set('refreshToken', r.data.refreshToken); } }

request.description: Auto-saves accessToken and refreshToken to collection variables.

exec: if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.resetToken) pm.collectionVariables.set('resetToken', r.resetToken); }

if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.data) { pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', r.data.accessToken); pm.collectionVariables.set('refreshToken', r.data.refreshToken); } }
if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.resetToken) pm.collectionVariables.set('resetToken', r.resetToken); }

if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.data) { pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', r.data.accessToken); pm.collectionVariables.set('refreshToken', r.data.refreshToken); } }
if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.resetToken) pm.collectionVariables.set('resetToken', r.resetToken); }

if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.data) { pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', r.data.accessToken); pm.collectionVariables.set('refreshToken', r.data.refreshToken); } }

request.description: Auto-detects role from DB. Works for user, admin, and superadmin accounts. No role pre-selection needed.
Verifies the access token and returns the current user. Also silently issues a fresh access token.

exec: if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); if (r.data && r.data.accessToken) pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', r.data.accessToken); }

request.description: Generate a new access token using the refresh token. Works for all roles.
Set logoutAll=true to revoke all sessions across devices.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Ranveer Singh",
  "born": "6 July 1985",
  "birthPlace": "Bombay, Maharashtra, India",
  "age": 40,
  "nationality": "Indian",
  "citizenship": ["Indian"],
  "occupation": ["Actor"],
  "yearsActive": "2010–Present",
  "eyeColor": "Dark Brown",
  "hairColor": "Black",
  "spouse": "Deepika Padukone",
  "netWorth": "₹300–350 Crore",
  "introduction": "Ranveer Singh is one of the most electrifying performers in Indian cinema.",
  "socialMedia": {
    "instagram": "https://www.instagram.com/ranveersingh/",
    "twitter": "https://twitter.com/RanveerOfficial"
  },
  "tags": ["Ranveer Singh", "Bollywood Actor", "Indian Actor"],
  "categories": ["Indian Actor", "Bollywood Actor"],
  "status": "published",
  "isActive": true,
  "isFeatured": true
}

item.name: Content — Celebrity Outfits
item.description: Requires admin or superadmin token. Occasions: RED CARPET | AIRPORT | CASUAL | PARTY | FORMAL | STREET STYLE | OTHER. Price ranges: $ | $$ | $$$ | $$$$.

body.raw:
{
  "celebrityId": "{{celebrityId}}",
  "celebrityName": "Ranveer Singh",
  "title": "Ranveer Singh at IIFA Awards 2024",
  "description": "Ranveer turned heads in a bold sequined blazer paired with tailored trousers.",
  "occasion": "RED CARPET",
  "priceRange": "$$$",
  "image": "https://example.com/ranveer-iifa-2024.jpg",
  "imageAlt": "Ranveer Singh in sequined blazer at IIFA 2024",
  "outfitItems": [
    {
      "type": "Blazer",
      "brand": "Gucci",
      "price": "$2,500",
      "buyingUrl": "https://gucci.com/blazer",
      "description": "Gold sequined double-breasted blazer"
    },
    {
      "type": "Trousers",
      "brand": "Gucci",
      "price": "$800"
    }
  ],
  "tags": ["IIFA", "Bollywood", "Award Show"],
  "eventDate": "2024-05-25",
  "eventLocation": "Abu Dhabi, UAE",
  "isActive": true
}

item.name: Content — Celebrity News
item.description: Requires admin or superadmin token. Categories: MOVIES | MUSIC | FASHION | LIFESTYLE | AWARDS | RELATIONSHIPS | CAREER | OTHER.

body.raw:
{
  "headline": "Ranveer Singh Wins Best Actor at Filmfare Awards 2024",
  "excerpt": "Ranveer Singh takes home the coveted Filmfare Award for Best Actor.",
  "content": "Full article content here...",
  "category": "AWARDS",
  "celebrity": "Ranveer Singh",
  "tags": ["Ranveer Singh", "Filmfare", "Awards"],
  "featuredImage": "https://example.com/ranveer-filmfare.jpg",
  "featuredImageAlt": "Ranveer Singh holding Filmfare trophy",
  "isPublished": true,
  "isFeatured": false
}

item.name: Content — Movies
item.description: Requires admin or superadmin token. Status: UPCOMING | IN_THEATERS | STREAMING | COMPLETED.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Poor Things",
  "description": "A young woman's incredible journey of self-discovery.",
  "synopsis": "The incredible tale and fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter...",
  "director": "Yorgos Lanthimos",
  "genre": ["Comedy", "Drama", "Romance"],
  "releaseDate": "2023-12-08",
  "duration": 141,
  "poster": "https://example.com/poor-things-poster.jpg",
  "posterAlt": "Poor Things movie poster",
  "backdrop": "https://example.com/poor-things-backdrop.jpg",
  "backdropAlt": "Poor Things backdrop",
  "trailer": "https://youtube.com/watch?v=example",
  "cast": [
    { "actor": "{{celebrityId}}", "character": "Bella Baxter", "role": "LEAD" }
  ],
  "language": "English",
  "country": "Ireland",
  "productionCompany": ["Element Pictures"],
  "status": "COMPLETED"
}

item.name: Content — Movie Reviews
item.description: Requires admin or superadmin token. reviewerType: USER | CRITIC | CELEBRITY.

body.raw:
{
  "movie": "{{movieId}}",
  "title": "A Masterpiece of Surreal Storytelling",
  "content": "Poor Things is a visually stunning and narratively bold film...",
  "rating": 9.2,
  "reviewerType": "CRITIC",
  "reviewerName": "Roger Ebert Jr.",
  "reviewerAvatar": "https://example.com/reviewer-avatar.jpg",
  "pros": ["Exceptional cinematography", "Outstanding performance"],
  "cons": ["Might be too surreal for some viewers"]
}

request.description: Returns total users, admins, DB collection count, API metrics, and storage info.
Returns every account regardless of role (user, admin, superadmin) with per-role counts.

item.name: SuperAdmin — User Management
item.description: CRUD for regular users (role=user). Requires superadmin token.

request.description: Allowed fields: name, email, role, isActive. Superadmin accounts: only newPassword is permitted.

item.name: SuperAdmin — Admin Management
item.description: CRUD for admin accounts. Requires superadmin token.

item.name: SuperAdmin — Celebrity Management
item.description: Full CRUD for celebrities. Requires superadmin token. status: draft | published | archived.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Ranveer Singh",
  "nationality": "Indian",
  "occupation": ["Actor"],
  "introduction": "One of the most electrifying performers in Indian cinema.",
  "status": "published",
  "isActive": true,
  "isFeatured": true
}

request.description: Slug is auto-generated from name if not provided.

item.name: SuperAdmin — Outfit Management
item.description: Full CRUD for celebrity outfits. Requires superadmin token. Occasions: RED CARPET | AIRPORT | CASUAL | PARTY | FORMAL | STREET STYLE | OTHER. Price ranges: $ | $$ | $$$ | $$$$.
